1→'use client';
     2→
     3→// Updated sidebar with dark mode WP-admin styling and full navigation
     4→import { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react';
     5→import { useAuth } from '@/app/context/AuthContext';
     6→import { createClientComponentClient } from '@supabase/auth-helpers-nextjs';
     7→import Link from 'next/link';
     8→import Image from 'next/image';
     9→import { useRouter } from 'next/navigation';
    10→import { createNavigationStructure } from '@/app/utils/navigationHelper';
    11→
    12→interface SidebarMenuProps {
    13→  isOpen: boolean;
    14→  onToggle: () => void;
    15→  showToggleButton?: boolean; // Optional prop to hide the default toggle button
    16→}
    17→
    18→interface NavItem {
    19→  name: string;
    20→  path?: string;
    21→  children?: NavItem[];
    22→}
    23→
    24→export default function SidebarMenu({ isOpen, onToggle, showToggleButton = true }: SidebarMenuProps) {
    25→  const { user, signOut } = useAuth();
    26→  const router = useRouter();
    27→  const [shouldShow, setShouldShow] = useState(false);
    28→  const [expandedItems, setExpandedItems] = useState<{[key: string]: boolean}>({});
    29→  const [navItems, setNavItems] = useState<NavItem[]>([]);
    30→  const [isUserMenuOpen, setIsUserMenuOpen] = useState(false);
    31→  const supabase = createClientComponentClient();
    32→  const userMenuRef = useRef<HTMLDivElement>(null);
    33→
    34→  // Navigation structure will be created from the shared utility
    35→  const [navigationStructure, setNavigationStructure] = useState<{
    36→    adminMenuItem: NavItem;
    37→    specialFirstItem: NavItem;
    38→    oldAllGroupItem: NavItem;
    39→    hardcodedNavItems: NavItem[];
    40→  } | null>(null);
    41→
    42→  useEffect(() => {
    43→    const checkSidebarSetting = async () => {
    44→      if (!user?.id) {
    45→        setShouldShow(false);
    46→        return;
    47→      }
    48→
    49→      try {
    50→        const { data, error } = await supabase
    51→          .from('users')
    52→          .select('sidebar_menu_active')
    53→          .eq('auth_id', user.id)
    54→          .single();
    55→
    56→        if (error) {
    57→          console.error('Error fetching sidebar setting:', error);
    58→          setShouldShow(false);
    59→          return;
    60→        }
    61→
    62→        setShouldShow(data?.sidebar_menu_active || false);
    63→      } catch (err) {
    64→        console.error('Error:', err);
    65→        setShouldShow(false);
    66→      }
    67→    };
    68→
    69→    checkSidebarSetting();
    70→  }, [user, supabase]);
    71→
    72→  useEffect(() => {
    73→    // Fetch navigation items when component mounts
    74→    const fetchNavItems = async () => {
    75→      try {
    76→        const response = await fetch('/api/navigation');
    77→        const data = await response.json();
    78→        setNavItems(data);
    79→        
    80→        // Create navigation structure using shared utility
    81→        const navStructure = createNavigationStructure(data);
    82→        setNavigationStructure(navStructure);
    83→      } catch (error) {
    84→        console.error('Error fetching navigation:', error);
    85→      }
    86→    };
    87→
    88→    fetchNavItems();
    89→  }, []);
    90→
    91→  useEffect(() => {
    92→    function handleClickOutside(event: MouseEvent) {
    93→      const target = event.target as HTMLElement;
    94→      
    95→      // Don't close dropdown if clicking on a link or inside a link
    96→      const isLinkClick = target.tagName === 'A' || target.closest('a');
    97→      if (isLinkClick) {
    98→        return;
    99→      }
   100→      
   101→      if (userMenuRef.current && !userMenuRef.current.contains(target)) {
   102→        setIsUserMenuOpen(false);
   103→      }
   104→    }
   105→    document.addEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside);
   106→    return () => document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside);
   107→  }, []);
   108→
   109→  const toggleExpanded = (itemName: string) => {
   110→    setExpandedItems(prev => ({
   111→      ...prev,
   112→      [itemName]: !prev[itemName]
   113→    }));
   114→  };
   115→
   116→  const handleSignOut = async () => {
   117→    await signOut();
   118→    router.push('/login');
   119→  };
   120→
   121→  const renderNavItem = (item: NavItem, depth: number = 0) => {
   122→    const hasChildren = item.children && item.children.length > 0;
   123→    const isExpanded = expandedItems[item.name];
   124→    const isStarred = item.name === 'admin' || item.name === 'navgroup1';
   125→    
   126→    
   127→    
   128→    // Handle separator items (no path)
   129→    if (hasChildren && item.children?.some(child => !child.path)) {
   130→      // This is a dropdown with separator items
   131→    } else if (!item.path && hasChildren) {
   132→      // This is a separator item itself
   133→      return (
   134→        <div key={item.name} className="px-4 py-1">
   135→          <div className="text-xs text-gray-500 bg-gray-800 px-2 py-1 rounded">
   136→            {item.name}
   137→          </div>
   138→        </div>
   139→      );
   140→    }
   141→
   142→    if (hasChildren) {
   143→      return (
   144→        <div key={item.name} className="mb-1">
   145→          <button
   146→            onClick={() => toggleExpanded(item.name)}
   147→            className={`w-full text-left px-4 py-2 text-sm flex items-center justify-between hover:bg-gray-800 transition-colors ${
   148→              depth > 0 ? 'pl-8' : ''
   149→            }`}
   150→          >
   151→            <span className="flex items-center">
   152→              {isStarred && (
   153→                <svg 
   154→                  className="w-4 h-4 mr-2 text-yellow-400" 
   155→                  fill="currentColor" 
   156→                  viewBox="0 0 20 20"
   157→                >
   158→                  <path d="M9.049 2.927c.3-.921 1.603-.921 1.902 0l1.07 3.292a1 1 0 00.95.69h3.462c.969 0 1.371 1.24.588 1.81l-2.8 2.034a1 1 0 00-.364 1.118l1.07 3.292c.3.921-.755 1.688-1.54 1.118l-2.8-2.034a1 1 0 00-1.175 0l-2.8 2.034c-.784.57-1.838-.197-1.539-1.118l1.07-3.292a1 1 0 00-.364-1.118L2.98 8.72c-.783-.57-.38-1.81.588-1.81h3.461a1 1 0 00.951-.69l1.07-3.292z" />
   159→                </svg>
   160→              )}
   161→              <span className="text-gray-200">{item.name}</span>
   162→            </span>
   163→            <svg
   164→              className={`w-4 h-4 text-gray-400 transition-transform ${isExpanded ? 'rotate-180' : ''}`}
   165→              fill="none"
   166→              viewBox="0 0 24 24"
   167→              stroke="currentColor"
   168→            >
   169→              <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7" />
   170→            </svg>
   171→          </button>
   172→          {isExpanded && (
   173→            <div className="bg-gray-900">
   174→              {item.children?.map(child => {
   175→                // Handle separator items in dropdown
   176→                if (!child.path) {
   177→                  return (
   178→                    <div key={child.name} className="px-8 py-1">
   179→                      <div className="text-xs text-gray-500 bg-gray-800 px-2 py-1 rounded">
   180→                        {child.name}
   181→                      </div>
   182→                    </div>
   183→                  );
   184→                }
   185→                return renderNavItem(child, depth + 1);
   186→              })}
   187→            </div>
   188→          )}
   189→        </div>
   190→      );
   191→    }
   192→
   193→    
   194→    // Only render Link if path exists
   195→    if (!item.path) {
   196→      return (
   197→        <div key={item.name} className="px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-400">
   198→          {item.name} (no path)
   199→        </div>
   200→      );
   201→    }
   202→    
   203→    return (
   204→      <Link
   205→        key={item.path}
   206→        href={item.path}
   207→        className={`block px-4 py-2 text-sm text-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-800 transition-colors ${
   208→          depth > 0 ? 'pl-8 text-gray-300' : ''
   209→        }`}
   210→        onClick={onToggle}
   211→      >
   212→        {item.name}
   213→      </Link>
   214→    );
   215→  };
   216→
   217→  // Organize all navigation items
   218→  const getAllNavItems = () => {
   219→    if (!navigationStructure) return [];
   220→    
   221→    const items = [
   222→      navigationStructure.adminMenuItem, 
   223→      navigationStructure.specialFirstItem, 
   224→      navigationStructure.oldAllGroupItem,
   225→      ...navigationStructure.hardcodedNavItems
   226→    ];
   227→    
   228→    return items;
   229→  };
   230→
   231→  if (!shouldShow) {
   232→    return null;
   233→  }
   234→
   235→  return (
   236→    <>
   237→      {/* Overlay for mobile */}
   238→      {isOpen && (
   239→        <div 
   240→          className="fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 z-20 lg:hidden"
   241→          onClick={onToggle}
   242→        />
   243→      )}
   244→
   245→      {/* Sidebar */}
   246→      <div className={`fixed top-0 left-0 z-30 h-full w-64 bg-gray-900 shadow-xl transform transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out ${
   247→        isOpen ? 'translate-x-0' : '-translate-x-full'
   248→      }`}
   249→      style={{
   250→        backgroundColor: '#23282d', // WP-admin dark color
   251→      }}>
   252→        {/* Header with Logo */}
   253→        <div className="flex items-center justify-between p-4 border-b border-gray-700">
   254→          <Link href="/" className="flex items-center space-x-3">
   255→            <div className="relative h-8 w-8 flex-shrink-0">
   256→              <svg
   257→                width="32"

   259→                viewBox="0 0 32 32"
   260→                fill="none"

   262→              >
   263→                <circle
   264→                  cx="16"
   265→                  cy="16"
   266→                  r="14"
   267→                  fill="#87CEEB"
   268→                />
   269→              </svg>
   270→            </div>
   271→            <span className="text-lg font-semibold text-white">
   272→              Tregnar
   273→            </span>
   274→          </Link>
   275→          <button
   276→            onClick={onToggle}
   277→            className="p-1 rounded-md text-gray-400 hover:text-white hover:bg-gray-700"
   278→          >
   279→            <svg className="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Great! I can see that the SidebarMenu component fetches navigation items from `/api/navigation` endpoint. The navigation structure is managed through the `createNavigationStructure` utility. Let me check the navigation API endpoint to see where the hardcoded navigation items are defined:

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Read** `./app/api/navigation/route.ts`

Result:

```
1→import { getNavigation } from '@/app/utils/getNavigation';
     2→import { NextResponse } from 'next/server';
     3→
     4→export const dynamic = 'force-dynamic'; // This ensures the route is not cached
     5→
     6→export async function GET() {
     7→  try {
     8→    console.log('API: Starting navigation request...');
     9→    
    10→    // Log the current working directory
    11→    const cwd = process.cwd();
    12→    console.log('API: Current working directory:', cwd);
    13→    
    14→    // Log the app directory path
    15→    const appDir = `${cwd}/app`;
    16→    console.log('API: App directory path:', appDir);
    17→    
    18→    // Log the protected directory path
    19→    const protectedDir = `${appDir}/(protected)`;
    20→    console.log('API: Protected directory path:', protectedDir);
    21→    
    22→    // Try to get navigation items
    23→    console.log('API: Calling getNavigation...');
    24→    const navItems = await getNavigation();
    25→    console.log('API: Navigation items received:', navItems);
    26→    
    27→    if (!navItems || navItems.length === 0) {
    28→      console.log('API: No navigation items found');
    29→      return NextResponse.json([], { 
    30→        status: 200,
    31→        headers: {
    32→          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    33→          'Cache-Control': 'no-store'
    34→        }
    35→      });
    36→    }
    37→    
    38→    return NextResponse.json(navItems, {
    39→      headers: {
    40→        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    41→        'Cache-Control': 'no-store'
    42→      }
    43→    });
    44→  } catch (error) {
    45→    console.error('API: Error in navigation route:', error);
    46→    return NextResponse.json(
    47→      { 
    48→        error: 'Failed to get navigation', 
    49→        details: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error',
    50→        stack: error instanceof Error ? error.stack : undefined
    51→      },
    52→      { 
    53→        status: 500,
    54→        headers: {
    55→          'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    56→          'Cache-Control': 'no-store'
    57→        }
    58→      }
    59→    );
    60→  }
    61→}
```

Now let me check the `getNavigation` utility function:

_**Agent (claude-sonnet-4-20250514)**_

Tool use: **Read** `./app/utils/getNavigation.ts`

Result:

```
1→import { readdir, stat } from 'fs/promises';
     2→import { join, relative, sep } from 'path';
     3→
     4→interface NavItem {
     5→  name: string;
     6→  path?: string;
     7→  children?: NavItem[];
     8→}
     9→
    10→// Custom rule system for navigation grouping
    11→const NAVIGATION_GROUPS = {
    12→  navgroup5: {
    13→    name: 'c',
    14→    displayName: 'c', // Parent item for "c" dropdown
    15→    children: [
    16→      { name: 'fapikeys1', path: '/fapikeys1' }
    17→    ]
    18→  },
    19→  navgroup6: {
    20→    name: 'navgroup6',
    21→    displayName: 'navgroup6', // You can customize this display name
    22→    children: [
    23→      { name: 'panjar1', path: '/fbin2/panjar1' },
    24→      { name: 'panjar1', path: '/panjar1' },
    25→      { name: 'panjar2', path: '/fbin2/panjar2' },
    26→      { name: 'panjar3', path: '/bin4/panjar3' },
    27→      { name: 'panjar3', path: '/panjar3' },
    28→      { name: 'panjar4', path: '/bin31/panjar4' },
    29→      { name: 'profile', path: '/profile' },
    30→      { name: 'pubnar1', path: '/bin37/pubnar1' }
    31→    ]
    32→  }
    33→};
    34→
    35→// Get list of paths that should be excluded from main navigation
    36→function getExcludedPaths(): string[] {
    37→  const excludedPaths: string[] = [];
    38→  Object.values(NAVIGATION_GROUPS).forEach(group => {
    39→    group.children.forEach(child => {
    40→      excludedPaths.push(child.path);
    41→    });
    42→  });
    43→  return excludedPaths;
    44→}
    45→
    46→// Recursively find all page.tsx files under dir
    47→async function findAllPages(dir: string): Promise<string[]> {
    48→  let results: string[] = [];
    49→  try {
    50→    const items = await readdir(dir, { withFileTypes: true });
    51→    for (const item of items) {
    52→      if (item.name.startsWith('.') || item.name === 'node_modules') continue;
    53→      const fullPath = join(dir, item.name);
    54→      if (item.isDirectory()) {
    55→        results = results.concat(await findAllPages(fullPath));
    56→      } else if (item.isFile() && item.name === 'page.tsx') {
    57→        results.push(fullPath);
    58→      }
    59→    }
    60→  } catch (e) {
    61→    // Skip directories that don't exist or can't be read
    62→    console.log(`Skipping directory ${dir}:`, e instanceof Error ? e.message : 'Unknown error');
    63→  }
    64→  return results;
    65→}
    66→
    67→export async function getNavigation() {
    68→  const appDir = join(process.cwd(), 'app');
    69→  const protectedDir = join(appDir, '(protected)');
    70→  
    71→  let pageFiles: string[] = [];
    72→  
    73→  // Scan protected directory
    74→  try {
    75→    const protectedPages = await findAllPages(protectedDir);
    76→    pageFiles = pageFiles.concat(protectedPages);
    77→  } catch (e) {
    78→    console.error('Error reading protectedDir:', e);
    79→  }
    80→  
    81→  // Scan bin directories (bin4, bin31, bin32, etc.)
    82→  try {
    83→    const appItems = await readdir(appDir, { withFileTypes: true });
    84→    for (const item of appItems) {
    85→      if (item.isDirectory() && item.name.match(/^bin\d+$/)) {
    86→        const binDir = join(appDir, item.name);
    87→        const binPages = await findAllPages(binDir);
    88→        pageFiles = pageFiles.concat(binPages);
    89→      }
    90→    }
    91→  } catch (e) {
    92→    console.error('Error scanning bin directories:', e);
    93→  }
    94→
    95→  // Also scan fbin directories (fbin2, fbin3, etc.)
    96→  try {
    97→    const appItems = await readdir(appDir, { withFileTypes: true });
    98→    for (const item of appItems) {
    99→      if (item.isDirectory() && item.name.match(/^fbin\d+$/)) {
   100→        const fbinDir = join(appDir, item.name);
   101→        const fbinPages = await findAllPages(fbinDir);
   102→        pageFiles = pageFiles.concat(fbinPages);
   103→      }
   104→    }
   105→  } catch (e) {
   106→    console.error('Error scanning fbin directories:', e);
   107→  }
   108→
   109→  // Get excluded paths for filtering
   110→  const excludedPaths = getExcludedPaths();
   111→
   112→  // Build navigation structure - extract page names from all directories
   113→  const navItems: NavItem[] = [];
   114→  
   115→  for (const file of pageFiles) {
   116→    const rel = relative(appDir, file);
   117→    const parts = rel.split(sep);
   118→    let pageName = '';
   119→    let pagePath = '';
   120→    
   121→    if (parts[0] === '(protected)') {
   122→      // Handle protected routes: (protected)/bin31/panjar4/page.tsx
   123→      if (parts.length === 3) {
   124→        // e.g. ['(protected)', 'profile', 'page.tsx']
   125→        pageName = parts[1];
   126→        pagePath = `/${parts[1]}`;
   127→      } else if (parts.length > 3) {
   128→        // e.g. ['(protected)', 'bin31', 'panjar4', 'page.tsx']
   129→        pageName = parts[parts.length - 2]; // Get the page name (e.g., 'panjar4')
   130→        pagePath = `/${parts.slice(1, -1).join('/')}`; // Full path without (protected) and page.tsx
   131→      }
   132→    } else if (parts[0].match(/^bin\d+$/)) {
   133→      // Handle bin routes: bin45/weplich1/page.tsx
   134→      if (parts.length === 3) {
   135→        // e.g. ['bin45', 'weplich1', 'page.tsx']
   136→        pageName = parts[1]; // Get the page name (e.g., 'weplich1')
   137→        pagePath = `/${parts.slice(0, -1).join('/')}`; // Full path without page.tsx
   138→      }
   139→    } else if (parts[0].match(/^fbin\d+$/)) {
   140→      // Handle fbin routes: fbin2/fapikeys1/page.tsx
   141→      if (parts.length === 3) {
   142→        // e.g. ['fbin2', 'fapikeys1', 'page.tsx']
   143→        pageName = parts[1]; // Get the page name (e.g., 'fapikeys1')
   144→        pagePath = `/${parts.slice(0, -1).join('/')}`; // Full path without page.tsx
   145→      }
   146→    } else if (parts.length === 2) {
   147→      // Handle root level routes: profile/page.tsx
   148→      pageName = parts[0]; // Get the page name (e.g., 'profile')
   149→      pagePath = `/${parts[0]}`; // Simple root path
   150→    }
   151→    
   152→    // Filter out dynamic routes (paths containing brackets like [id])
   153→    const isDynamicRoute = pagePath.includes('[') && pagePath.includes(']');
   154→    
   155→    // Only add to main navigation if not excluded, has valid name/path, and is not dynamic
   156→    if (pageName && pagePath && !excludedPaths.includes(pagePath) && !isDynamicRoute) {
   157→      navItems.push({ name: pageName, path: pagePath });
   158→    }
   159→  }
   160→
   161→  // Add navigation groups as parent items with children
   162→  Object.values(NAVIGATION_GROUPS).forEach(group => {
   163→    navItems.push({
   164→      name: group.name,
   165→      children: group.children
   166→        .filter(child => !(child.path.includes('[') && child.path.includes(']'))) // Filter out dynamic routes
   167→        .map(child => ({
   168→          name: child.name,
   169→          path: child.path
   170→        }))
   171→    });
   172→  });
   173→
   174→  // Group remaining items by their first letter
   175→  const alphabeticalGroups: { [key: string]: NavItem[] } = {};
   176→  const finalNavItems: NavItem[] = [];
   177→  
   178→  // Separate navigation groups from regular items
   179→  const navigationGroups: NavItem[] = [];
   180→  const regularItems: NavItem[] = [];
   181→  
   182→  navItems.forEach(item => {
   183→    if (item.children && item.children.length > 0) {
   184→      navigationGroups.push(item);
   185→    } else {
   186→      regularItems.push(item);
   187→    }
   188→  });
   189→
   190→  // Group regular items by first letter
   191→  regularItems.forEach(item => {
   192→    const firstLetter = item.name.charAt(0).toLowerCase();
   193→    if (!alphabeticalGroups[firstLetter]) {
   194→      alphabeticalGroups[firstLetter] = [];
   195→    }
   196→    alphabeticalGroups[firstLetter].push(item);
   197→  });
   198→
   199→  // Create parent items for each letter that has items
   200→  Object.keys(alphabeticalGroups).sort().forEach(letter => {
   201→    const items = alphabeticalGroups[letter];
   202→    if (items.length === 1) {
   203→      // If only one item, add it directly without grouping
   204→      finalNavItems.push(items[0]);
   205→    } else {
   206→      // Create a parent group for this letter
   207→      finalNavItems.push({
   208→        name: letter.toUpperCase(),
   209→        children: items.sort((a, b) => a.name.localeCompare(b.name))
   210→      });
   211→    }
   212→  });
   213→
   214→  // Add existing navigation groups
   215→  finalNavItems.push(...navigationGroups);
   216→
   217→  // Sort alphabetically by name (parent items will be mixed with regular items)
   218→  return finalNavItems.sort((a, b) => a.name.localeCompare(b.name));
   219→}
```
